{"seo": [], "price": "11000000", "title": "Honey Bee Valley Apartment", "content": "

About this property

Honey Bee Valley Apartment in Gachie is a well-planned residential complex that is strategically located along Kihara-Gacii-Karura road. Other features of the apartment include 24-hour security and two car parking spaces.

The apartment is located in close proximity to ABC place, Westlands, Gigiri area, Village Market, Two Rivers Mall and the CBD, making it an ideal location for easy access to shopping, entertainment, and business centers.

Overall, Honey Bee Valley Apartment in Gachie offers a practical and homely living space that is perfect for families or groups of friends looking for a comfortable and secure living environment.

3 Bedroom for 11 Million (Slightly Negotiable)
